pick_container.description: Pick up the prismatic container from the coffee machine.

place_container.description: Place the container correctly in the coffee machine.

pick_lid.description: Pick up the prismatic lid from the coffee machine.

place_lid.description: Place the lid correctly onto the coffee machine.

rotate_rotor.description: Spin the rotor to grind coffee beans.

clean_rotor.description: Clean the coffee residue off the rotor.

press_button.description: Press the button to start brewing the coffee.

clean_button.description: Clean the coffee residue off the button.

clean_coffee_machine_body.description: Clean the coffee machine body to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_entire_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine, including the container, lid, rotor, button, and machine body.
